msg.packetlogger.logger.hexdump_without_: Can't use hex dump without full packet logging
msg.packetlogger.logger.not_running: Packet logger has not been started
msg.packetlogger.logger.nothing_to_captu: Can't disable both inbound and outbound packet logging
msg.packetlogger.logger.started: Packet logger started (inbound: %s, outbound: %s, log packets: %s, log size: %s, hex dump: %s, time limit: %s)
msg.packetlogger.logger.stopped: Packet logger stopped and log saved
msg.packetlogger.logger.stopped_async: Packet logger stopped. Log output may be delayed due to amount of logged data
tooltip.packetlogger.btn.confirm.no_capt: Nothing to capture, enable at least one of inbound or outbound
